outcome_summary: EC-022 test FROZEN due to precondition failures. Cannot measure Context Lift without: (1) operational learning loop, (2) LVI computation, (3) IoS-010 Bridge. Test will resume when preconditions are satisfied. Per CEO State of System Memo 2026-02-07.
rationale: The test asks: 'Does context integration improve predictions?' The system answers: 'We cannot evaluate â€” learning loop broken, no data.' This is not a test failure. It is a precondition failure. The test should be frozen, not failed.

database_verification.query: SELECT test_code, escalation_state FROM fhq_calendar.canonical_test_events WHERE test_code = 'TEST-EC022-OBS-001'
